title: ESM: remove code for Node v12

body:
### Description

Node version v12 has been dropped in #4845.

We remove ESM code which adressed Node versions <= 12.

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/48415653/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/48415653)

Coverage decreased (-0.008%) to 94.328% when pulling **15353fe82677ff84999155f402abaf0b7a2559cf on juergba/esm-cleanup** into **59f619227428e22265b26d3788505d6e081c0e2a on master**.
